required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Extension Study to Evaluate the Post-Treatment Safety and Duration of Clinical Effect of LIPO-202
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind Extension Study to Evaluate the Post-Treatment Safety and Duration of Clinical Effect of LIPO-202 in Subjects Who Completed Either the LIPO-202-CL-18 or LIPO-202-CL-19 Study

brief_summary.textblock: LIPO-202-CL-23 is a follow-on study to evaluate the post-treatment safety and duration of clinical effect of LIPO-202 in subjects that completed either the LIPO-202-CL-18 or LIPO-202-CL-19 (parent studies). No risks related to treatment are anticipated as subjects will not receive additional treatment with LIPO-202 or Placebo for LIPO-202 in this follow-on study.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the post-treatment duration of clinical effect of LIPO-202. photonumeric score and global abdominal perception score.
primary_outcome.description: Measured by change in clinician reported photonumeric score and change in patient reported global abdominal perception score.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the post-treatment safety profile of LIPO-202. Measured by physical examination, adverse events, vital signs, and laboratory tests
primary_outcome.description: Measured by physical examination, adverse events, vital signs, and laboratory tests

arm_group.description: Subjects received either LIPO-202 or Placebo for LIPO-202 in the parent study (LIPO-202-CL-18 or LIPO-202-CL-19). Subjects will not receive any additional treatment in this follow-on study.
Subjects received either LIPO-202 or Placebo for LIPO-202 in the parent study (LIPO-202-CL-18 or LIPO-202-CL-19). Subjects will not receive any additional treatment in this follow-on study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male or non-pregnant female subjects who completed Study LIPO-202-CL-18 or LIPO-202-CL-19
- Capable of providing written consent
- Willing to comply with the study procedures and schedule
Exclusion Criteria:
- Female subjects who are pregnant or are not using adequate birth control methods
- Plan on starting a weight loss or exercise program during the study
- Plan to enroll in another investigational drug or device study
- Unlikely or unable to adhere to the study visit schedule
